text: Smarana kara, yakhana musa (ah) tamra sampradayake balalah he amara sampradaya, tomara kena amake kasta da'o, athaca tomara jana ye, ami tomadera kache allahara rasula. Atahpara tara yakhana bakrata abalambana karala, takhana allaha tadera antarake bakra kare dilena. Allaha papacari sampradayake pathapradarsana karena na.
